title: rework pantheon
body: i think i'm not the only one who want a {{champion:80}} pantheon rework. this champ is a really good champ but why don't riot rework him improving his special attacks? I think it is a champion with a lot of potential but now I can not express it completely, I believe that the ulti should be faster in action and statistics (both of which motion attack) should be increased, with respect to the q I would say that it is perfect, but we aumenterei the duration of the damage and slightly to let him hurt even if the build does not allow a great physical harm to increase its life. I would say that could be a considerable improvement of the champ despite the skill should not be changed
